resources.string: You are few minutes away to open a business account tailored to meet your business needs!
A sole proprietor is someone who owns an unincorporated business by himself and has full control over it.
What you’ll need to get started:
Business License, DBA certificate*, A valid ID.
Legal name, EIN*, date of establishment, Country of legal formation.
* A DBA certificate, also known as a trade name, fictitious name, or assumed name, allows you to conduct business under a name other than your legal business name (if applicable).
Just like you, we love all of our customers, but for this type of account there are certain requirements you will need to match.
Your business is located in the U.S.
You are a US citizen or a resident.
You can provide your Social Security Number.
If your business is involved in any of these activities, you might need to provide further information.
One last thing before we get started.
You’re just minutes away from opening your account.
